path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SpacePi Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Users cannot withdraw their tokens if they have no rewards
findings.description: The withdraw function allows a user to withdraw their LP tokens and rewards if the user has rewards. If the user has not reward, the withdraw function will revert the transaction.

findings.title: SLP Token Implements ERC20 Functions Incorrectly
findings.description: The SLP token incorrectly implements some ERC20 functions and unnecessarily includes allowance and approve functions which always return maximum and true, respectively.

findings.title: An admin can set the rate to zero to disable users exchanging their vouchers
findings.description: The setRate function allows an admin to set the rate of a voucher and a token. However, it currently permits an admin to set the rate to zero, which disables users from exchanging their vouchers for tokens.
